constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TENNEY:
H.R. 3733.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1 of the United States Constitution,
providing--``All legislative Powers herein granted shall be
vested in a Congress of the United States, which shall
consist of a Senate and House of Representatives.''
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H3301-3304)

title: Essential Caregivers Act of 2021
